education.description: Active member of CS Nest and Badger Future Founders.
LLM research, model implementation using Retrieval Augmented Generation, application development. Market research and technology commericalization evaluation. Promotion efforts.

Explored SEO methods like guest blogging, content creation, and more. Competitor SEO analysis using Regex, Pandas, and Visualization packages in Python. Sales development representative for Cybersecurity services.
Learned Angular web development framework, used git, specialized in AG-Grid JavaScript concepts. Integrated AG-Grid tables and functionality onto customer-facing Data Integration and Migration Hub.
Influencer acquisition campaign. Gathered and edited content for multiple brands, designed mockups, and negotiated with manufacturers.
Performed market research through polling relevant industry professionals. Wrote user manual for R2 platform. Simulated test data and graphical analyses using R and Excel.
Learned the importance of positive first impressions on customers. Practiced prioritization and improvisation skills to adapt to changing restaurant conditions.
Attended to customers needs while keeping the restaurant clean. Increased overall restaurant efficiency through delegating appropriate tasks to coworkers.

Traveled to Puno, Cusco, Machu Picchu, Lima in Peru; La Paz, the Amazon jungle, and the Galapagos Islands in Ecuador. Hiked portion of the Incan trail, explored capital cities, performed service work (home restoration, youth education), and was immersed in local language and culture.

Led all marketing efforts via email, text campaigns, and cold-calling to recruit 80+ participants. Created website, online payment system, custom t-shirts and volleyballs for each participant. Managed a team of 5 employees/coaches throughout 9 camps over 4 weeks.
Innovation and Entrepreneurship Living and Learning Community.

Moved SEO ranking into the top 3 for relevant keywords by creating backlinks and blog posts. Generated 4 new revenue streams through construction documentation in the Denver area. Captured, edited, and produced 21 construction site videos leveraging drones to showcase developments.

First honors all eight semesters. 2-time Kairos retreat leader. Active member of Jesuit Honor Society, tutoring students weekly. Weekly volunteering for after-school program at Highland Community School in Milwaukee.
Improved 23 paid clients testing results an average of 3 points.
Assistant coach, managing drills and participant safety.

project.title: Stock Optimization
project.description: Combining my interests in data science and finance to produce a comprehensive report on Modern Portfolio Theory.

project.title: Univise
project.description: Transforming the academic advising industry with a free, 24/7-access LLM-powered chatbot tool.

project.title: Comida Andes
project.description: During my semester in Peru, fundraised and kickstarted local chef Johan's online presence.

project.title: Volleyball Camps
project.description: To continue my love for the sport, I organized  beach volleyball camps, managed coaches, and recruited participants.

project.title: Aerial Photography
project.description: During my 2020 year in Denver, I enjoyed capturing shots of developing suburbs and construction sites using drones and cessna aircraft.

project.title: EDEM Valencia, Spain
project.description: Participated in a 2-week entrepreneurial pitch competition completely immersed in Spanish language.
